tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
quoteText:
This always includes:

  • your name, email address, and phone number;
  • your businessâ€™s name and mailing address;
  • the domain name(s) to which your ads will direct people who see them. and
  • billing information needed to process payment.
